quest.name: The Full Report, Warts and All
journal: Alisaie is not about to let Erenville out of her sight.
objectives: Head to the designated location while transfigured and accompanied by Alphinaud and Alisaie.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: It feels wrong to spy on Erenville, helpful as he's been...but what other choice do we have?

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Did you see which way Erenville went...?

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: Forgive me, my attention has been elsewhere... We were following Erenville, weren't we?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Erenville was headed westwards along the path outside the Archeion. Come, we can still catch him!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: It seems Y'shtola wishes to have a word with us.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We've fallen too far behind. And this damned mist won't help matters!

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: I can still hear it...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Hold a moment. I have an idea.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: If memory serves, that colossal wall-like structure is Logistikon Beta─one of Labyrinthos's climate control centers.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: It should have its own lifts, with which one could access the upper or lower tiers... Aye, if I were an agent of the Forum, it would make for a convenient meeting place...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: But even if we happen to find Erenville in the company of said agent, we cannot expect them to reveal issues of importance as we nonchalantly stroll past.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Nay, we shall have to remain undetected.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: If only G'raha and his Vanish spell were here...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Oh, but there are other ways of turning “invisible.”

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Hippity hop, my little toads!

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: Goodness!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Unaccustomed to transfiguration? Worry not. It will wear off with the passage of time.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I suggest you and your green companions hop along and catch up with Erenville. Should you feel the magicks fading, return to me and I will refresh the enchantment.

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: Um...and what am I to do in the meantime?

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Wait here with me. In your current state of mind, you'd be as likely to leap into the jaws of a predator as you would learn anything of note.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Which reminds me: ware the creatures hereabouts. In that form, you are essentially defenseless.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have changed into a toad! You must remain transfigured in order to progress with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will return from your transfigured status if you move too far away. Look to your map for the transfiguration's area of effect.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Speak with Y'shtola to restore or prolong the transfiguration.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Ribbit ribbit?

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Stand still, and I shall recast the spell. The transformation should last long enough to allow you to find and spy upon Erenville.

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: <sigh> I would've enjoyed being a toad for a little while, if only for the change of pace... But Y'shtola is right. I am too preoccupied with other matters.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Ribbit?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Alphi-toad's stare speaks volumes, all of which you presume are variations of “Why are you not a toad?” Speak with Y'shtola to have her recast the spell.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Ribbit, ribbit... Ribbit!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Alphi-toad and Ali-toad are now accompanying you. Keep them at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can leave your quest companions behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with them and selecting the option to part ways.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you wish to have your companions join you again, return and speak with them at the original location.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Talk.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Part ways.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Discuss your surroundings.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Ribbit ribbit. Ribbit...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Ribbit? Ribbit ribbit?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Ribbit? Ribbit ribbit!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Ribbit... Ribbit ribbit?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Ribbit ribbit!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Ali-toad glares tiny toad daggers at you, likely in a furious attempt to express the sentiment that “This won't work if you're not a toad!” Speak with Y'shtola to have her recast the spell.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Ribbit... Ribbit ribbit?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Alphi-toad attempts and fails to shake his head, but you nevertheless understand that he is telling you this is the wrong way.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Ribbit ribbit... Ribbit ribbit!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Ali-toad turns to face the north. Perhaps she is suggesting you cross the bridge...

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: Are you sure you wish to part ways with your companion?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Ribbit? Ribbit ribbit.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Alphi-toad hops back towards Y'shtola and Krile.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Ribbit!? Ribbit!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Ali-toad hops back towards Y'shtola and Krile.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Ribbit ribbit!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Ribbit! Ribbit ribbit!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Your companions have yet to arrive. Be sure they are at your side before attempting to continue.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Our toad performance needs work, apparently. I'll have to pay more attention the next time I see one...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: You've come back alone? Where are your warty companions?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I suppose we should have known a gleaner who specializes in animal procurement would not be so easily deceived... Yet he seemed inclined to put his trust in us all the same.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: More importantly, perhaps, we've discovered a new piece of the puzzle─this “momentous duty” the Forum agent mentioned.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Sharlayan has been called to action, and the Telophoroi's declaration was the catalyst. Whatever charge it is they hope to fulfill, they deem it of sufficient import to disrupt all of Labyrinthos, not to mention ignore Eorzea's request for aid...
